channel.title: What ints do you put in if you want to add a cape to your client?
channel.description:
Well title says everything, i need to know the ints for adding a skillcape. cause i tryed and it glitched as a weapon
Help appreciated[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2008, 02:12:52 pm[/size][hr]Omg seriously? no-one knows it?:'( like in this times i feel dissapointed in the people of moparscape nor the staff.
